properties.entry: SELECT WARRIOR_NO, WARRIOR_NAME, WARRIOR_LEVEL, WARRIOR_EXP, MAX_HP, HP, ATTACK, STAT_POINT, GOLD, ISALIVE, CREATE_DATE FROM WARRIOR WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND WARRIOR_DEL_FL = 'N'
INSERT INTO WARRIOR VALUES( SEQ_WARRIOR_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, ? )
UPDATE WARRIOR SET WARRIOR_DEL_FL = 'Y' WHERE WARRIOR_NO = ?
SELECT WARRIOR_NO, WARRIOR_NAME, WARRIOR_LEVEL, WARRIOR_EXP, MAX_HP, HP, ATTACK, STAT_POINT, GOLD, ISALIVE, CREATE_DATE FROM WARRIOR WHERE WARRIOR_NO = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ? AND WARRIOR_DEL_FL = 'N'
